Question: General mole balance equation of species ‘i’ at any instant is as follows: ________

b) Rate of moles of ‘i’ in + Rate of moles of ‘i’ out = Rate of moles of ‘i’ accumulated

b) -rA = \(\frac{kP_A P_B}{(1+ k_A P_A+ k_R P_R)^2} \)
c) -rA = \(\frac{kP_A P_B}{1+ k_A P_A+ k_R P_R} \)
d) -rA = \(\frac{kP_A P_B P_R}{(1+ k_A P_A+ k_R P_R)^2} \)
